segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water spilling everywhere, and it’s already forming a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the water, but she doesn’t react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like she’s in her own little world, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it’ll take her to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, though, are being so sneaky with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get hurt, but I also hope they don’t get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
